channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller 8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller 8

item.title: CVE-2022-24423|2024-08-03T04:13:55.735Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%208
item.description: Dell iDRAC8 versions prior to 2.83.83.83 contain a denial of service vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to cause resource exhaustion in the webserver, resulting in a denial of service condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-34436|2024-08-03T09:07:16.284Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%208
item.description: Dell iDRAC8 version 2.83.83.83 and prior contain an improper input validation vulnerability in Racadm when the firmware lock-down configuration is set. A remote high privileged attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the firmware lock-down configuration and perform a firmware update.

item.title: CVE-2024-25951|2024-03-09T05:56:20.143Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%208
item.description: A command injection vulnerability exists in local RACADM. A malicious authenticated user could gain control of the underlying operating system.
